definition: extreme mental distress, to cause emotional anguish or make miserable
details:
noun
- extreme mental distress
= synonyms: torment
- extreme distress of body or mind
verb
- to cause emotional anguish or make miserable
= example: to cause emotional anguish or make miserable
= synonyms: hurt
- to suffer great pains or distress
= example: to suffer great pains or distress
